reviews.review: Найс

如果你还在思考为什么一个解密游戏能得到这么高的评分，难道真的有游戏能获得99.9%的人的推荐？不要迟疑了，这个游戏就是如此优秀。是的，这是一款解谜游戏，但是它的剧情不仅是简单的优秀，更是和解密元素完美地融合在一起，在完全不降低解密关卡的质量的前提下，还让游戏过程充满新鲜感。

对了，你也不用担心游戏是否过时。画面很出色。

Steam全站第一高评价的游戏，你绝不应错过。
The only missing thing was that there was no clear indicator when the game was finished.
Uno de los mejores juegos de Valve y tiene coop, ¿que mas queres? es un juego que te va a marcar si o si,  el primero es solamente el tutorial de lo que sigue, una obra maestra. 11/10

Jugue el Portal y me encanto, cuando compre el Portal 2 esperaba cosas buenas de el, pero supero mis espectativas.
Un juego que vale mucho la pena la Historia es demasiado buena para su corta duración.
A pesar de que lo acabe en unos días estoy satisfecho por su hermosa historia ademas no solo esta la historia si no que esta el modo de 2 jugadores ONLINE y LOCAL.
¡Lo recomiendo en cerio muy buen juego!
Good time playing coop with my friend

Приятная по стилистике игра. Много интересных головоломок, и вдвоём играть намного интересней. После одиночного сюжета и компании на двоих остаётся ещё много карт-головоломок от сообщества. Если и тут интересности кончатся, можно создавать свои камеры пыток в достаточно простом для освоения редакторе карт.
머리쓰면서 하는 퍼즐게임
Fast and easy classic. Beat it in under 6 hours. Super enjoyable for me and the stream.
２も安定の面白さ。セールの時には激安になるので1と２セットでどうぞ。

Might just be my favorite game of all times, Enjoyable puzzles, great storyline and amazing dialogue coming from very talented voice actors, J.K Simmons and Stephen merchant all outdid themselves with their excellent performance, Ellen McClaine appears again and with better dialogue than in Portal 1.
Lots of mods either by workshop or the very steam store, with each Steam Store mod being a standalone game using Portal 2 as a base.
i have yet to find a bug, plot inconsistency or thing that makes the game unenjoyable.
This is Valve's best game, no doubt.

This game is fairly challenging without being impossible. Most importantly, each level manages to be engaging and fun to complete. The dialogue is witty and memorable. I would recommend this game especially while it is on sale.
One of the best games out there, and the satisfaction of solving a level is always there. The story and lore is deep and rich, but that doesn't mean it's obvious.

Portal 2 is a classic.  It is a puzzle game unlike many others.  To put it simply, at the time of writing, the game is on sale for $0.99.  Buy it.

Playing through the campaign was a lot of fun, especially after playing the original Portal for some context. The game's portal mechanics were confusing in the beginning, but become easier to utilize after completing more levels/puzzles. I would definitely recommend this if you're into puzzles and/or comedy (as the robots' commentary is pretty funny).

Amazing as fuck sequel to one of the most iconic video games of all time. Simply put, Portal 2 is such an improvement over the 1st entry in so many ways. One of these for example is the new co-op mode, featuring a completely new story, experience and characters, along with countless levels to play and things to unlock.

Portal 2 is always extremely cheap alongside the 1st and all the other Valve games during sales like these, so all the more reason to give it a go!
